description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. A Sci-Fi first person shooter. The station on Xa-Tam is up for grabs! Play as a Federated Armed Space Trooper (F.A.S.T.) armed with six weapons including Lasers, Grenades, Rockets, and more. Battle two alien races on 25 levels and defeat powerful robotic bosses to claim victory. Choose your races and play online Death matches on Xbox LIVE with 18 different Multiplayer maps. Version 1.1
description.short: A Sci-Fi first person shooter. The station on Xa-Tam is up for grabs!
